title: Summary
description: Congratulations! You've completed the Buyer Breakthrough Workshop. Here's a summary of your work and the key insights you've developed.

placeholders.nextStepsPlaceholder:
e.g., - Create a landing page for my refined offer
- Develop a prototype or minimum viable version
- Test with 3-5 potential customers
- Gather feedback and iterate

tooltips.nextStepsTooltip: What specific actions will you take to bring your refined offer to market?

examples: Validate your offer with potential customers through interviews or surveys
Create a simple landing page to gauge interest and collect email addresses
Develop a pilot version of your offer to test with a small group of customers
Map out the full customer journey from awareness to purchase and delivery
